title: SEC joins Do Kwon’s request to start trial after extradition to US
description:
The SEC agreed with a request from Do Kwon’s legal team to potentially postpone the trial date but opposed severing his case with Terraform’s.

The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) joined a request from lawyers representing Do Kwon to have its trial start after the Terraform Labs co-founder’s extradition. 

In a Jan. 15 filing in U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York, the SEC said it was “fully prepared, willing, and able to proceed” with a trial against Kwon scheduled to begin on Jan. 29, but joined a request to push the start date no earlier than March 18. Kwon’s legal team is dealing with the legal challenges of extradition to the U.S. while the Terraform Labs co-founder is in Montenegro, where he was arrested in March 2023.

“The SEC joins in Kwon’s request for a modest adjournment so that he may participate in the trial,” said the filing. “If the trial date is adjourned, the SEC respectfully requests that trial commence on April 15, 2024.”

Read more

title: Record $1.6 billion of staked Ethereum redemptions led by Celsius and Figment
description:
Over 650,000 units of staked Ethereum, valued at approximately $1.6 billion, were redeemed last week—the largest amount of redemption since the Shanghai Upgrade was completed last year. A Dune Analytics dashboard shared by Tom Wan, an analyst at 21 Shares, showed that the bankrupt crypto lender Celsius and staking service provider Figment were the primary […]

title: Court Uses Bitcoin Blockchain for Legal Summons, Revolutionizing Defendant Notification
description: A federal court in the U.S. has accepted the validity of using information contained in a Bitcoin transaction to notify a defendant about a civil action. The case, believed to be the first where this method is accepted, might help solve hundreds of cryptocurrency theft cases in which the attacker’s identity is unknown. Federal Court […]

title: SEC assents to Do Kwon, Terra trial delay until April 15
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is unopposed to delaying Terra’s crypto fraud trial and instead open to waiting till Terraform co-founder Do Kwon is extradited.
